Forms.Html:
This page will be displayed at end of each sequence as confirmation. DO NOT USE THIS TEMPLATE. IT IS OVERWRITTEN ON AN UPGRADE.
Please make a copy of form Default-Confirmation (saving with End State checked) and create a custom confirmation message. Then set this custom form as the End State form on a sequence.
